chapters.title: Chapter 27:  A Call to Stand
chapters.info: Nissa, p. 429—One of the Accepted. She brought the news, along with Nicola, that the Hall was meeting without informing Egwene first. Egwene hopes she and Nicola will both be raised to the shawl before the Last Battle; they are young, but powerful, and every sister would be needed. See also Treehill, Nicola.
